location: A street leading to the Park.

lines.text: Enter MISTRESS PAGE, MISTRESS FORD, and DOCTOR CAIUS

lines.speaker: mistress page
lines.text: Master doctor, my daughter is in green: when you see your time, take her by the band, away with her to the deanery, and dispatch it quickly. Go before into the Park: we two must go together.

lines.speaker: doctor caius
lines.text: I know vat I have to do. Adieu.

lines.speaker: mistress page
lines.text: Fare you well, sir. My husband will not rejoice so much at the abuse of Falstaff as he will chafe at the doctors marrying my daughter: but tis no matter better a little chiding than a great deal of heartbreak.

lines.speaker: mistress ford
lines.text: Where is Nan now and her troop of fairies, and the Welsh devil Hugh

lines.speaker: mistress page
lines.text: They are all couched in a pit hard by Hernes oak, with obscured lights which, at the very instant of Falstaffs and our meeting, they will at once display to the night.

lines.speaker: mistress ford
lines.text: That cannot choose but amaze him.

lines.speaker: mistress page
lines.text: If he be not amazed, he will be mocked if he be amazed, he will every way be mocked.

lines.speaker: mistress page
lines.text: Against such lewdsters and their lechery Those that betray them do no treachery.

lines.speaker: mistress ford
lines.text: The hour draws on. To the oak, to the oak!
